eu.mondo.mondix.live

Interface IChangeAwareMondixRelation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMondixRelation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChangeAwareMondixRelation

    public interface IChangeAwareMondixRelation
extends IMondixRelation
    Change-aware guarantees to the Mondix relation concept.

    query instances are live queries.

    Author:
    Bergmann Gabor

    • Method Detail

      • openQueryInstance

        ILiveQueryInstance openQueryInstance()
        Description copied from interface: IMondixRelation
        Returns a query instance against the entire contents of the relation.

        Result should be disposed if no longer used.

        Same as IMondixRelation.openQueryInstance(List, Map) parameterized by (null, null).

        Specified by:
        openQueryInstance in interface IMondixRelation

      • openQueryInstance

        ILiveQueryInstance openQueryInstance(java.util.List<java.lang.String> selectedColumnNames,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> filter)
        Description copied from interface: IMondixRelation
        Returns a query instance filtered to the given values that only returns the selected columns.

        Result should be disposed if no longer used.

        Guaranteed to return IUnaryQueryInstance or INullaryQueryInstance if 1 respectively 0 columns are selected.

        Specified by:
        openQueryInstance in interface IMondixRelation
        Parameters:
        selectedColumnNames - the ordered, unique list of columns that should be returned for tuples in this relation (can be empty). If null is given, all columns are selected in the original order (see IMondixRelation.getColumns()).
        filter - a map from zero or more column names to concrete values. The query will be filtered to those tuples only that take the given values at the given columns. If null is given, no filtering is done (equivalently to an empty map).
